overview: Intense twink Kory Houston has been secretly in love with his best friend (power bottom Armond Rizzo) for as long as he can remember. The only problem is, Armond is far more interested in older, hot daddies like German lover Hans Berlin. But still waters run deep, and Kory's calm demeanor masks a simmering rage that's ready to boil over and destroy the relationship he values most. Will Kory's deceptive schemes finally win him the hot ass he craves? Starring Armond Rizzo, Kory Houston, Hans Berlin, Troy Accola and Roman Todd.
title: Brothers 3: Blood Brothers
